meanings.definition: Beyond the physical realm; transcending the laws of physics.
meanings.sent1: The concept of ultraphysical beings fascinated the young students in science class.
meanings.sent2: The scientist proposed a theory involving ultraphysical dimensions beyond our understanding.
meanings.sent3: The idea of an ultraphysical unicorn roaming the forest made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was so intense, it felt almost ultraphysical in nature.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured an ultraphysical world where gravity seemed to have no effect.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to phenomena that are not explainable by traditional physical laws.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious lights in the sky were described as ultraphysical by the witnesses.
meanings.sent2: The paranormal investigator believed in the existence of ultraphysical entities.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to predict the future was jokingly called ultraphysical by the owner.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was so sharp, it felt almost ultraphysical in its accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The magician's tricks seemed almost ultraphysical, leaving the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring beyond the realm of the physical world.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of ultraphysical realms where spirits dwell beyond our reach.
meanings.sent2: The philosopher pondered the existence of ultraphysical dimensions beyond human perception.
meanings.sent3: The idea of an ultraphysical tea party with invisible guests amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His dreams felt so vivid and ultraphysical, like a journey to another reality.
meanings.sent5: The author's words painted an ultraphysical landscape where imagination knew no bounds.
